text: Country stars Tim McGraw and his wife, Faith Hill, are the subjects of a divorce rumor. The pair has toured the world together belting out their hits songs including “ Like We Never Loved at All, ” “ Angry All the Time, ” and of course, “ Meanwhile Back at Mama ’ s. ” The power couple has been married for 21 years and has three beautiful daughters together. However, a new report from OK Magazine claimed that the diva no longer feels connected to her spouse and is ready to move on with her life. A so - called pal said for many years the legendary singer and songwriter stayed with McGraw because she did not want to break her family.
